```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(easystats)
library(optimx)
```

```{r}

rts <- readr::read_csv(
  here("Analysis", "02-Data_Preprocessing", "Combined_Clean_Data", "TL_combined_cleaned.csv")
)

```

```{r}

nw_data_acc <- rts %>%
filter(item_type != "word")

head(nw_data_acc)
```

```{r}
nw_data_acc <- nw_data_acc %>%
  group_by(participant) %>%
  filter(
    between(
      key_resp_2.rt,
      mean(key_resp_2.rt, na.rm = TRUE) - 2.5 * sd(key_resp_2.rt, na.rm = TRUE),
      mean(key_resp_2.rt, na.rm = TRUE) + 2.5 * sd(key_resp_2.rt, na.rm = TRUE)
    )
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

```

```{r}

write_csv(nw_data_acc, file="acc_cleaned.csv")
```
